data.question: What is the general formula for the hybrid crystalline materials based on inorganic polymers with organic spacers (IPOS)?
What causes the anionic [Cd(SCN)3]- complex to form one-dimensional infinite polymeric zig-zag chains?
True or False: The [(18C6)M]+ cations exhibit nonlinear optical properties for both M+ = K+ and Na+.
What is the yield percentage of the compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] based on 12C4?
What is the role of the [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dication in the structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: It serves as the 'spacer', 'controller', and 'template' for the formation of the 2-D motif.

data.question: True or False: The title compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] crystallizes in a tetragonal unit cell.
What is the average Cd···Cd distance bridged by the linkage SCN- ligands in the compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
What is the significance of the square net formed by the 'dangling' S atoms in the structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
True or False: The layers in the structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] are parallel to the crystallographic b axis.
What is the coordination type of SCN- ligands confirmed by IR spectroscopy in the compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: Four ν(CN) peaks at 2129, 2094, 2070, and 2023 cm-1

data.question: True or False: The [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dications fit loosely into the complementary 'deep' and 'shallow' holes of adjacent layers.
What hypothesis is proposed based on the templating mechanism observed in the structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: The square-shaped [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dication 'induces' and/or 'directs' the formation of the anionic polymeric structure.

data.question: True or False: The title compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] represents the first example of a 2-D anionic cadmium thiocyanate polymeric structure with a dicadmium complex as the basic building block.
What is the space group of the compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
True or False: The structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] is based on monocadmium complexes as building blocks.
What is the role of the shape selectivity vs charge specificity of the cations in the formation of anionic [Cdm(SCN)n] polymers?
data.answer: It raises questions concerning their relative importance in the formation of the polymers.

data.question: True or False: The title compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] was prepared by a simple mixing of reactants without stirring.
What is the crystallographic b axis length of the compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
True or False: The [(12C4)2Cd]2+ dications in the compound [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6] are coordinated with six oxygens from two 12C4 ligands.
What is the significance of the 'checker board' arrangement in the structure of [(12C4)2Cd][Cd2(SCN)6]?
data.answer: It illustrates the alternating 'deep' and 'shallow' holes within each layer.
